Text: Shadow—
It is time...for us to leave you.

We, the Seven Shadows, have chosen to begin secretly
increase the Shadow Garden's power in preparation for
all-out conflict with the Cult of Diablos.

We must counter the immense influence of the Church
in various ways—for their invisible clutches extend to
every corner of this world.

We are certain that day will come. The showdown
between Cid—Shadow—and the Cult of Diablos.
A deadly battle in the shadows of the world—
...This is goodbye.

For this is what we, the Seven Shadows, can do for
Shadow and the Shadow Garden.
How're things coming along?

We're in position, sir. No sign of anyone nearby.
However, regarding the convoy of the "possessed"
we're tracing...
Is there a problem?

We've discovered the remains of a cage and carriage
used by the convoy, but they appear to have been
abandoned several years ago.

Which means we received outdated intel. If only
the Cult had been more generous with what
they shared with us.

Still, there's no doubt that this ghost town was used
as a base by whoever intercepted that convoy.

We'll have to see if it leads to clues about their
whereabouts or identity...
That won't be necessary.
What! Who's there?
Captain! There's fire!

Don't panic and stay focused! We've got backup
on the way.

Y-Yes, sir! But it looks like the village is
surrounded. C-Could we be―
Aagh!
Above us!
Exterminate us? You'll eat those words!
Ahahahah!
Gyaaah!
A therianthrope! Do not cower, soldiers!
Fine... Then I'll make you!
Huh! Sl-Slime?
I'm unharmed... They're bluffing!
Epsilon!
Dance...the dance of death!
Aaaaghh!
What? The music made the slime harden!
These...are no ordinary bandits!
A little late to realize that!
Tonight...you die here.
*cough, cough*...Behind me! How did you...
Damn it! An assassin!
Oof!
Huh? Did you just trip on your own—
Aghh...!
You...threw...your...blade?!

Even we struggle to predict her next move,
so there's no way you'd stand a chance.

My attacks are a little more straightforward.
Whether you can evade them is a different
story.
*gasp*

Im-Impossible! They've taken out the reinforcements
guarding the perimeter?
Did I not tell you? We will exterminate you.

But not right away. First, we will wait for someone
from both the Church and the Cult of Diablos to
come scurrying to your rescue.

It is them that we, the Shadow Garden,
have business with.
This is the story of the Seven Shadows—

Shadow's pawns and loyal servants, scattered across
the lands,

expanding the Shadow Garden's reach in preparation
for the eventual showdown with the Cult of Diablos.
